Wisdom: إِنَّ كَرَمَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَا يَنْقُضُ حِكْمَتَهُ فَلِذَلِكَ لَا يَقَعُ [لَا تَقَعُ‏] الْإِجَابَةُ فِي كُلِّ دَعْوَةٍ
enWisdom: The kindness of Allah does not annul His wisdom; it is for this reason that not all supplications are answered

Wisdom: رُبَّمَا سَأَلْتَ الشَّيْ‏ءَ فَلَمْ تُعْطَهُ وَأُعْطِيتَ خَيْراً مِنْهُ
enWisdom: Sometimes you may ask for something but you are not granted it, rather you are given [something] better than it
Sin prevents the one’s supplication from being answered

Wisdom: الدَّاعِي بِلَا عَمَلٍ كَالْقَوْسِ بِلَا وَتَرٍ
enWisdom: The one who supplicates without action is like a bow without a bowstring

Wisdom: لَا تَسْتَبْطِئْ إِجَابَةَ دُعَائِكَ وَقَدْ سَدَدْتَ طَرِيقَهُ بِالذُّنُوبِ
enWisdom: Do not reckon that your supplication is being answered [too] slowly while you have obstructed its path with [your] sins

Wisdom: لَا يُقَنِّطَنَّكَ تَأْخِيرَ إِجَابَةِ الدُّعَاءِ فَإِنَّ الْعَطِيَّةَ عَلَى قَدْرِ النِّيَّةِ وَرُبَّمَا تَأَخَّرَتِ الْإِجَابَةُ لِيَكُونَ ذَلِكَ أَعْظَمَ لِأَجْرِ السَّائِلِ وَأَجْزَلَ لِعَطَاءِ النَّائِلِ
enWisdom: Never get disheartened by a delayed answer to [your] supplication, for indeed that which is granted is commensurate with the intention, and sometimes the answer might be delayed so that it may result in a greater reward for the seeker and a more bountiful grant for the recipient
